Package br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut

Class Facade

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.Facade
public class Facade extends Object

Facade class that implements the interface of the Jackut system.

  • Method Details

    • zerarSistema

      public void zerarSistema()

      Clears all data held in the system.

      See Also:
      • System

    • criarUsuario

      public void criarUsuario(String login, String password, String name) throws LoginSenhaInvalidsException, AccountAlreadyExistsException

      Creates a user with the provided account data.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login
      password - User's password
      name - User's name
      Throws:
      LoginSenhaInvalidsException - Exception thrown if the login or password is invalid
      AccountAlreadyExistsException - Exception thrown if the login is already registered
      See Also:
      • User

    • abrirSessao

      public String abrirSessao(String login, String senha) throws LoginSenhaInvalidsException, UserIsNotRegisterException

      Opens a session for a user with the provided login and password, and returns an ID for this session.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login
      senha - User's password
      Returns:
      ID of the session
      Throws:
      LoginSenhaInvalidsException - Exception thrown if the login or password is invalid
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered

    • getAtributoUsuario

      public String getAtributoUsuario(String login, String attribute) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, AttributeNotFilledException

      Retrieves the value of a user's attribute stored in their profile.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login
      attribute - Attribute to be returned
      Returns:
      Value of the attribute
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered
      AttributeNotFilledException - Exception thrown if the attribute is not filled

    • editarPerfil

      public void editarPerfil(String id, String attribute, String valor) throws UserIsNotRegisterException

      Modifies the value of a user's profile attribute to the specified value.

      A valid session (identified by id) must be open for the user whose profile you want to edit.

      Parameters:
      id - Session ID
      attribute - Attribute to be modified
      valor - New value of the attribute
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered

    • adicionarAmigo

      public void adicionarAmigo(String id, String amigo) throws UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserIsNotRegisterException, UserAutoRelationException, UserAlreadySentConviteException, UserIsEnemyException

      Adds a friend to the user currently logged in through the specified session id.

      Parameters:
      id - Session ID
      amigo - Friend's login to be added
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - Exception thrown if the user is already friends with the logged-in user
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user or friend is not registered
      UserAutoRelationException - Exception thrown if the user tries to add themselves as a friend
      UserAlreadySentConviteException - Exception thrown if the user has already requested friendship from the friend
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the friend

    • ehAmigo

      public boolean ehAmigo(String login, String friend) throws UserIsNotRegisterException

      Returns true if the two users are friends.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login
      friend - Friend's login
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating if the users are friends
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if one of the users is not registered

    • getAmigos

      public String getAmigos(String login) throws UserIsNotRegisterException

      Returns the list of friends of the specified user.

      The return is formatted as a String in the format: {friend1,friend2,friend3,...}

      Parameters:
      login - User's login
      Returns:
      List of friends of the user formatted as a String
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered

    • enviarRecado

      public void enviarRecado(String id, String destinatario, String recado) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, SelfSentErrandException, UserIsEnemyException

      Sends the specified message to the specified recipient.

      A valid session (identified by id) must be open for the user who wants to send the message.

      Parameters:
      id - Session ID
      destinatario - Recipient's login
      recado - Message to be sent
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user or recipient is not registered
      SelfSentErrandException - Exception thrown if the user tries to send a message to themselves
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the recipient

    • lerRecado

      public String lerRecado(String id) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, DontHaveErrandExcpetion

      Returns the first message in the user's message queue with the open session identified by id.

      Parameters:
      id - Session ID
      Returns:
      First message in the user's message queue
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered
      DontHaveErrandExcpetion - Exception thrown if the user has no messages in the queue

    • criarComunidade

      public void criarComunidade(String id, String nome, String descricao) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, CommunityAlreadyExistisException

      Creates a community with the provided data.

      Parameters:
      id - Session ID
      nome - Community name
      descricao - Community description
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered
      CommunityAlreadyExistisException - Exception thrown if the community already exists

    • getDescricaoComunidade

      public String getDescricaoComunidade(String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException
      Retrieves the description of a community by its name.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name of the community.
      Returns:
      The description of the community.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - If the community does not exist.

    • getDonoComunidade

      public String getDonoComunidade(String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException
      Retrieves the owner of a community by its name.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name of the community.
      Returns:
      The owner of the community.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - If the community does not exist.

    • getMembrosComunidade

      public String getMembrosComunidade(String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException
      Retrieves the members of a community by its name.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name of the community.
      Returns:
      The members of the community.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - If the community does not exist.

    • getComunidades

      public String getComunidades(String login) throws UserIsNotRegisterException
      Retrieves the communities associated with a user by their login.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user.
      Returns:
      A string containing the communities associated with the user.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.

    • adicionarComunidade

      public void adicionarComunidade(String id, String nome) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, CommunityNotExistsException, UserAlreadyInACommunityException
      Adds a user to a community.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      nome - The name of the community.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.
      CommunityNotExistsException - If the community does not exist.
      UserAlreadyInACommunityException - If the user is already a member of another community.

    • lerMensagem

      public String lerMensagem(String id) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, DontHaveMessagesException
      Reads a message for a user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      Returns:
      The message read by the user.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.
      DontHaveMessagesException - If the user has no messages.

    • enviarMensagem

      public void enviarMensagem(String id, String comunidade, String mensagem) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, CommunityNotExistsException
      Sends a message to a community.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      comunidade - The name of the community.
      mensagem - The message to be sent.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.
      CommunityNotExistsException - If the community does not exist.

    • ehFa

      public boolean ehFa(String login, String idolo)
      Checks if a user is a fan of another user.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user.
      idolo - The login of the idol.
      Returns:
      True if the user is a fan of the idol, false otherwise.

    • adicionarIdolo

      public void adicionarIdolo(String id, String Idolo) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserAutoRelationException, UserIsEnemyException
      Adds a user as an idol (fan) of another user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      Idolo - The login of the idol.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - If the user already has a relation with the idol.
      UserAutoRelationException - If the user is trying to establish a relation with themselves.
      UserIsEnemyException - If the user is an enemy of the idol.

    • getFas

      public String getFas(String login) throws UserIsNotRegisterException
      Retrieves the fans (idols) of a user by their login.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user.
      Returns:
      A string containing the fans of the user.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.

    • ehPaquera

      public boolean ehPaquera(String id, String paquera) throws UserIsNotRegisterException
      Checks if a user is in a romantic relationship (paquera) with another user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      paquera - The login of the person they are in a romantic relationship with.
      Returns:
      True if the user is in a romantic relationship with the other person, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.

    • adicionarPaquera

      public void adicionarPaquera(String id, String paquera) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserAutoRelationException, UserIsEnemyException
      Adds a user as a romantic partner (paquera) of another user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      paquera - The login of the romantic partner.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - If the user already has a relation with the romantic partner.
      UserAutoRelationException - If the user is trying to establish a relation with themselves.
      UserIsEnemyException - If the user is an enemy of the romantic partner.

    • getPaqueras

      public String getPaqueras(String id) throws UserIsNotRegisterException
      Retrieves the romantic partners (paqueras) of a user by their login.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      Returns:
      A string containing the romantic partners of the user.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.

    • adicionarInimigo

      public void adicionarInimigo(String id, String inimigo) throws UserIsNotRegisterException, UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserAutoRelationException
      Adds a user as an enemy of another user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      inimigo - The login of the enemy.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - If the user already has a relation with the enemy.
      UserAutoRelationException - If the user is trying to establish a relation with themselves.

    • removerUsuario

      public void removerUsuario(String id) throws UserIsNotRegisterException
      Removes a user from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user session.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - If the user is not registered.

    • encerrarSistema

      public void encerrarSistema() throws AttributeNotFilledException

      Writes the user registrations to a file and terminates the program.

      Reaching the end of a script (end of file) is equivalent to encountering this command.

      In this case, the command has no parameters, and will save only the registered users at this moment.

      Throws:
      AttributeNotFilledException - Exception thrown if any attribute is not filled
